channel.title: Tantra Talk Radio
channel.description: A delectable mix of interviews with experts in the field of sacred sexuality and call-in questions with practical answers about your relationship, your sex life, and integrating love and spirituality.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Exploring relationship, sacred sexuality, spirituality and love in our everyday lives.
channel.itunes:summary: A delectable mix of interviews with experts in the field of sacred sexuality and call-in questions with practical answers about your relationship, your sex life, and integrating love and spirituality.
channel.itunes:keywords: tantra, sacred sexuality, tantric sexuality, relationship, love, massage, lovemaking
channel.itunes:author: Diana Owens
